name: Rowlet

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

flavorText: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.

name: Litten
flavorText: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

name: Popplio

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

flavorText: This Pokémon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It's famous for being a hard worker.

name: Pikachu

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.

name: Snorlax-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Collapse
attacks.text: This Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Thunderous Snore
attacks.text: This attack can be used if this Pokémon is Asleep. If it is not Asleep, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Pulverizing Pancake-GX
attacks.text: This Pokémon is now Asleep. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Rockruff
flavorText: It's considered to be a good Pokémon for beginners because of its friendliness, but its disposition grows rougher as it grows up.

name: Pikipek

attacks.name: Nosedive
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

flavorText: It can peck at a rate of 16 times a second to drill holes in trees. It uses holes for food storage and for nesting.

name: Litten

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

flavorText: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

name: Togedemaru

attacks.name: Defense Curl
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Discharge
attacks.text: Discard all Lightning Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

flavorText: The long hairs on its back act as lightning rods. The bolts of lightning it attracts are stored as energy in its electric sac.

name: Shiinotic

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Grass Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Flickering Spores
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

flavorText: It emits flickering spores that cause drowsiness. When its prey succumb to sleep, this Pokémon feeds on them by sucking in their energy.

name: Bruxish

attacks.name: Vivid Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Psychic Fang
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

flavorText: It stuns its prey with psychokinesis and then grinds them to mush with its strong teeth. Even Shellder's shell is no match for it.

name: Passimian

attacks.name: Fling
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Team Play
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your Benched Passimian.

flavorText: They form groups of roughly 20 individuals. Their mutual bond is remarkable—they will never let down a comrade.

name: Oranguru

abilities.name: Instruct
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

flavorText: Deep in the jungle, high in the lofty canopy, this Pokémon abides. On rare occasions, it shows up at the beach to match wits with Slowking.

name: Lycanroc-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lycanfang-GX
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Zygarde
flavorText: This is Zygarde's form at times when it uses its overwhelming power to suppress those who endanger the ecosystem.

name: Solgaleo-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Ultra Road

attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Lunar Fall-GX
attacks.text: Knock Out 1 of your opponent's Basic Pokémon that isn't a Pokémon-GX. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Alolan Sandslash

abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card.

attacks.name: Smash Turn
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

flavorText: Fleeing a volcanic eruption, it settled on a snowy mountain. As it races through the snowfields, it sends up a spray of snow.

name: Oricorio

attacks.name: Supernatural Dance
attacks.text: For each Pokémon in your opponent's discard pile, put 1 damage counter on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Revelation Dance
attacks.text: If there is no Stadium card in play, this attack does nothing.

flavorText: This Oricorio has sipped purple nectar. Its elegant, attractive dance will send the minds and hearts of its enemies to another world.

name: Mudsdale

attacks.name: Enhanced Stomp

attacks.name: High Horsepower
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 40 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Amass

attacks.name: Power Cyclone

flavorText: It has a compassionate personality, but if it is angered, it completely destroys its surroundings with its intense breath.

name: Rowlet
flavorText: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.

name: Litten
flavorText: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

name: Popplio
flavorText: This Pokémon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It's famous for being a hard worker.

name: Lurantis

abilities.name: Sunny Day
abilities.text: The attacks of your Grass Pokémon and Fire Pokémon do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

flavorText: It requires a lot of effort to maintain Lurantis's vivid coloring, but some collectors enjoy this work and treat it as their hobby.

abilities.name: Queenly Majesty
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may have your opponent reveal their hand. Then, discard a card from it.

attacks.name: Trop Kick

flavorText: Its long, striking legs aren't just for show but to be used to kick with skill. In victory, it shows off by kicking the defeated, laughing boisterously.

name: Turtonator

attacks.name: Flame Cloak

flavorText: The shell on its back is chemically unstable and explodes violently if struck. The hole in its stomach is its weak point.

name: Vikavolt

abilities.name: Strong Charge

attacks.name: Electro Cannon
attacks.text: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon.

flavorText: It produces electricity via an electrical organ in its abdomen. It overwhelms bird Pokémon with shocking beams of electrical energy.

name: Mimikyu

attacks.name: Haunt
attacks.text: Put 1 damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Astonish

flavorText: Its actual appearance is unknown. A scholar who saw what was under its rag was overwhelmed by terror and died from the shock.

name: Tapu Koko

attacks.name: Flying Flip
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

flavorText: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity. It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.

attacks.text: This attack can be used if this Pokémon is Asleep. If it is not Asleep, this attack does nothing.

name: Cosmog

attacks.name: Dust Gathering

flavorText: Its body is gaseous and frail. It slowly grows as it collects dust from the atmosphere.

name: Alolan Meowth

attacks.name: Fake Out
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: This Pokémon was not originally found in Alola. Human actions caused a surge in their numbers, and they went feral. They're prideful and crafty.

name: Togedemaru

attacks.name: Nuzzle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: The spiny fur on its back is normally at rest. When this Pokémon becomes agitated, its fur stands on end and stabs into its attackers.

attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Entei

attacks.name: Rally Back
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during their last turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

flavorText: A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.

name: Phione

abilities.name: Whirlpool Suction
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may have your opponent switch their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon. If you do, discard all cards attached to this Pokémon and put it on the bottom of your deck.

flavorText: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs.

name: Blacephalon

attacks.name: Fireworks Bomb
attacks.text: Put 4 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like. If your opponent has exactly 3 Prize cards remaining, put 12 damage counters on them instead.

flavorText: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It's apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

name: Mismagius

attacks.name: Psywave
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.text: Choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into their deck.

flavorText: Feared for its wrath and the curses it spreads, this Pokémon will also, on a whim, cast spells that help people.

name: Terrakion

attacks.name: Cavern Counter
attacks.text: If all of your Benched Pokémon have at least 1 damage counter on them, this attack does 150 more damage.

flavorText: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokémon is spoken of in legends.

name: Celebi

attacks.name: Call for Greatness
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Pokémon-GX with different names, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Psy Bolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: This Pokémon wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.

name: Victini

attacks.name: Victory Sign
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards of different types and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

flavorText: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.

name: Charizard

abilities.name: Roaring Resolve
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 2 damage counters on this Pokémon. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Continuous Blaze Ball
attacks.text: Discard all Fire Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

flavorText: This Pokémon was created by Mewtwo to prove that copies can be even more powerful than their originals.

name: Pikachu

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

flavorText: Its nature is to store up electricity. Forests where nests of Pikachu live are dangerous, since the trees are so often struck by lightning.

name: Armored Mewtwo

attacks.name: Psychic Raid
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

flavorText: Mewtwo was on a rampage searching for meaning to its existence in this world when Giovanni suppressed and controlled its power.

name: Venusaur & Snivy-GX
rules: TAG TEAM rule: When your TAG TEAM is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Shining Vine
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, when you attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to it, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Solar Plant-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Charizard & Braixen-GX
rules: TAG TEAM rule: When your TAG TEAM is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.text: You may search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Crimson Flame Pillar-GX
attacks.text: Attach 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Confused. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Champions Festival
rules: Once during each player's turn, if that player has 6 Pokémon in play, they may heal 10 damage from each of their Pokémon.
This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card.

attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Joy Maker-GX
attacks.text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Pikachu

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

flavorText: It's in its nature to store electricity. It feels stressed now and then if it's unable to fully discharge the electricity.

name: Eevee

attacks.name: Running Charge
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.

flavorText: The question of why only Eevee has such unstable genes has still not been solved.

rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Spiky Shield
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spiky Storm-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Leafeon

attacks.name: Aromax
attacks.text: Heal all damage from 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Leaf Blade
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

flavorText: Although it doesn't like disputes, it will sharpen the leaf on its tail into a blade and fight if it has to protect its friends.

name: Glaceon

attacks.name: Snow Cloak
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Hypnotic Blizzard
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

flavorText: It protects itself by freezing its fur into sharp needles. It can drop its body temperature below –75 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Carracosta-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

flavorText: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.

name: Aipom

attacks.text: Discard random cards from your opponent's hand until they have 5 cards in their hand.

attacks.name: Tail Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

flavorText: As it did more and more with its tail, its hands became clumsy. It makes its nest high in the treetops.

flavorText: Feared for its wrath and the curses it spreads, this Pokémon will also, on a whim, cast spells that help people.

name: Sabrina & Brycen
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
When you play this card, you may discard 5 other cards from your hand. If you do, you may also search for up to 3 Pokémon of different types in this way.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).
